item.description:
Update: You can call or text me at 781-521-6963 if you are going to be late. The movie is sold out. The seating is first come first serve so look for me in line. Hope to see you there


The movie starts at 7:00 PM and I suspect it will sell out so we should meet in the lobby at 6:30 PM.
We also as usual go out to Unos afterward.

You will be responsible for getting your own tickets.
Purchase tickets online


About the movie

LEGENDARY SUPERHERO “IRON MAN” returns in this highly anticipated sequel to the Paramount Pictures and Marvel Entertainment film based on the Marvel character.

In “Iron Man 2,” director Jon Favreau and Oscar nominee Robert Downey Jr. pick up where the last “Iron Man” movie left off.

The film begins after the world has become aware that billionaire inventor Tony Stark (Downing) is the armored superhero Iron Man.

Stark now finds himself under pressure from the government, the press, and the public to share his technology with the military. Despite the overwhelming pressure, Stark remains unwilling to divulge the secrets behind his Iron Man armor. Stark fears the information will fall into the wrong hands.

With Pepper Potts (Gwyneth Paltro) and James “Rhodey” Rhodes (Don Cheadle) at his site, Stark forges new alliances and confronts new forces.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a red and white Meetup hat. I will be in line
item.name: Iron Man II - IMAX
